GET /api.description: serves up a json representation of all the available endpoints of the api

GET /api/topics.description: serves an array of all topics

GET /users/:username.description: serves an object of a single user

GET /api/articles/article_id.description: serves an object of a single article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

PATCH /api/articles/article_id.description: updates the vote count of an article by the specified amount, 1 by default, serves an object of the updated article

article.title: Living in the shadow of a great man
article.author: butter_bridge

DELETE /api/articles/:article_id.description: deletes the requested article, no response body. All comments that reference the article will be deleted

POST /api/articles/article_id/comments.description: posts a new comment to an article and serves an object of the new comment

GET /api/articles/article_id/comments.description: serves an array of comment objects for a given article

GET /api/articles.description: serves an array of all articles

POST /api/articles.description: posts a new article and responds with the article

PATCH /api/comments/:comment_id.description: updates the vote count on a comment by the specified amount, defaults to 1. Responds with the updated comment

DELETE /api/comments/:comment_id.description: deletes the requested comment, no response body
